creator: Sulake Corporation Oy
descriptionHtml:
Jump into the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves - and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've given you all inboxes! You'll get most of your news, notifications, and rewards from these helpful little bits of kit from now on.
During cookie wars and other competitive events, each team's progress will now be visible in a new community challenge meter, located on the beach.
Now, when you get coins and diamonds, you'll see a nice little animation showing it all being moved to your currency store (also known as your wallet.)

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New stuff:
We added a selection of new cosmetic effects and additions for high level guests. Shiny times lie ahead.
Bug fixes:
- Facebook login errors are now explained more clearly.
- We fixed an issue with the in-game camera. …Must. Take. More. Photos.
- We’ve also made an array of improvements and changes that should improve the performance and stability of loot boxes, room seasons, inboxes, and the distribution of rewards. Because, after all, stability is key.

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch Notes 3.25
New stuff:
The loot box machine is now called Lost and Found. (And loot boxes are now suitcases.)
We added the ability to open ten suitcases at a time!
VIP membership was added as an optional extra.
It's now much clearer which mini event is running in the UI.
A variety of bugs have also been fixed. Fun times.

title: Hotel Hideaway: Virtual World

creator: Sulake Corporation Oy
descriptionHtml:
Jump into the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves - and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Seasons were added to the Trials of Style!
Scoring in Trials of Style photoshoots is now more precise. (You'd get 3.52 instead of just 3.5, for example.)
You can now see how many other guests are watching a Concert Venue performance at the same time as you are!
We improved the performance/decreased lag when browsing the Hotel’s shops.
The performance of the looks editor has also been improved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We added a new level 50+ public room: Twilight Terrace!
- Pins have been added to the game! You can find them in your Sticktionary, go check them out.
- The Concert Venue now has background music and will have intro and outro videos before and after concerts.
- We added a new timer to the group competition UI.
- You can now see the top 100 rewards in a Trials of Style season.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We added a new level 50+ public room: Twilight Terrace!
- Pins have been added to the game! You can find them in your Sticktionary, go check them out.
- The Concert Venue now has background music and will have intro and outro videos before and after concerts.
- We added a new timer to the group competition UI.
- You can now see the top 100 rewards in a Trials of Style season.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version: bug fixes. Everyone loves bug fixes.
- We fixed the issue with some pins missing from the Sticktionary.
- We fixed the issue with outfit changing.
- Teleporting to friends now works as intended.
- The tier 5 friendship pin now counts existing friends. Note: you may need to make one more tier 5 friend to ensure all of them register and the right pin is unlocked.
- Items in the VIP Boutique shop are now available again for VIP members.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- This update contains the Merge Bot, but it'll actually be switched on some time after the update is live in app stores.
- We added a cool new animation to Lost and Found.
- It's now shown exactly what prestige level you are on your profile.
- You can now buy profile cards from a wider selection of shops.
- We fixed the bug with group leadership transfer.
Also: various fixes to Trials of Style and pins.

title: Hotel Hideaway: Virtual World

creator: Sulake Corporation Oy
descriptionHtml:
Jump into the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves - and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

No matter what you like to spend your time doing, Hotel Hideaway is the place to be. There’s oodles of fun to be had and secrets to discover, so jump in and make sure the other guests recognise your name!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your avatar down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewellery, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items released every week!
CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM
Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Complete daily tasks with your friends to earn fantastic rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
instagram.com/hideaway_official
descriptionShort: Live a social adventure in this virtual world! Meet and chat with new friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- It's nearly Xmas, so we added a gift calendar! We plan to activate the calendar on December 1st.
- Now, when you participate in mini events, you'll get extra rewards based on how many times you do certain things like spinning the wheel or open crates.
- We've changed things so that brand new guests get extra tasks to complete on their first day in the Hotel.
- We also simplified the avatar creation process for new guests.
- It's now easier to track your progress with pin unlocking.

creator: Sulake Corporation Oy
descriptionHtml:
Create your 3D avatar and jump into this exciting Social Virtual World! Will you become a charismatic Social Butterfly or a Style Icon, or perhaps the Ultimate Home Decorista? The choice is yours!

Enter the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves – and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your character down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewels, face items and even tattoos!

Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions!

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We added a season pass! We plan to enable this feature in early February.
- We improved the main UI screen so that you can now see which mini event is taking place and what you can get by participating.
- We added a 'Stores' button to the elevator screen so you can access your favourite shops more easily.
- The Collection screen now shows which items you own more clearly.
- You can now skip the tutorial when you make a new avatar.

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your character down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewels, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colors.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items are released every week!

CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM

Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the color scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D virtual world where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions!

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch notes 3.42

LOTS of UI improvements:

- Main UI / HUD revamped
- Profile card improved
- Published rooms and My Room UI updated

It’s now easier to find your friends’ rooms:

- Search rooms with player names
- Friends’ rooms prioritised in search
- Add link to your room in your profile card
- You can “favourite” rooms to find them later

Your level now displays as a whole number!

Create your 3D avatar and jump into this exciting Metaverse Virtual World! Will you become a charismatic Social Butterfly, a Style Icon, or perhaps the Ultimate Home Decorista? The choice is yours!

Enter the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role-playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves – and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your character down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewels, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style, and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colours.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy, and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items are released every week!

CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM

Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the colour scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D metaverse where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Lounge out and party with your friends at the Love Island Villa, a special public room created in collaboration with the Love Island TV series!

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions! Who knows, maybe your favourite artist will make an appearance! Keep an eye on our Socials to stay up-to-date on the schedule.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
twitter.com/HotelHideaway
instagram.com/hideaway_official
youtube.com/c/HotelHideaway/
tiktok.com/@hideaway.official

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch Notes 3.44

- So many of you have reached our highest level so we had to add MORE LEVELS. Avatar levels now go up to 229!

- To make giving out cookies faster, you can now give out cookies in batches of 10 or 100.

- Spinning the Tailor of Fortune has been made 2x faster.

- We’ve fixed the default camera appearing too zoomed in/zoomed out on different devices.

We’ve also squashed some bugs!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- More new levels are coming to Hideaway! We now have levels 230-250.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch notes 3.46

- NEW AVATAR CREATION! We improved the process of making a new avatar AND added more default items for better customisation! Hallelujah!

- Guests under level 50 will now be able to access the VIP area of Twilight Terrace with an active VIP subscription

- For your privacy, you can no longer see the online/offline status of people outside of your own group

There are also some minor bug fixes.

title: Hotel Hideaway: Virtual World

creator: Sulake Oy
descriptionHtml:
Create your 3D avatar and jump into this exciting Metaverse Virtual World! Will you become a charismatic Social Butterfly, a Style Icon, or perhaps the Ultimate Home Decorista? The choice is yours!

Enter the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role-playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves – and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your character down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewels, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style, and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colours.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy, and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items are released every week!

CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM

Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the colour scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D metaverse where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Lounge out and party with your friends at the Love Island Villa, a special public room created in collaboration with the Love Island TV series!

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions! Who knows, maybe your favourite artist will make an appearance! Keep an eye on our Socials to stay up-to-date on the schedule.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
twitter.com/HotelHideaway
instagram.com/hideaway_official
youtube.com/c/HotelHideaway/
tiktok.com/@hideaway.official

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch Notes 3.49

Get excited for a new quality-of-life update! This time, to your wardrobe.
We have added:

- Favouriting clothing and colours
- Filters to organise your wardrobe by favourites first, rarity high-low or low-high, newest to oldest, and most-least worn
- Accessories have their own categories
- Items you are wearing will always come up in a small window under each category for easy removal
- Undo and Redo buttons

Getting dress has gotten sooo much easier!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch Notes 3.53In this update:

- Trials of Style: get some diamonds as a bonus when you vote for the higher-rated outfit!

- Receive push notifications for messages you receive! You can choose to receive push notifications for new messages from friends, only messages from tier 3 or higher friends, or none at all.

- Received a gift from a close friend? Gift something back to them easier than before.

- Choose whether your dms are open or closed!

And bug fixes!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Patch Notes 3.54
In this update:

- LEADERBOARD UPDATE! We revamped our leaderboard system, check our recent in-game article for more info.

- The ‘Can’t afford’ pop-up window now allows you to automatically buy things with diamonds when you run out of coins! This also means we have removed the option to manually convert diamonds into coins in the coin shop.

- Saved outfits will always show your most recently saved outfits first.

And some bug fixes!

Enter the world of Hotel Hideaway: a social online 3D role-playing game full of opportunities to meet new people and make new friends. The Hotel is a lively and vibrant world full to the brim with social adventures and fun activities!

Dress to impress and stand out from the crowd with an abundance of stylish clothing, items and accessories. Customise your room with a variety of furniture items and decorations. Learn secret gestures and dance moves – and then party into the early hours inside unique public rooms!

CREATE AND CUSTOMISE YOUR 3D AVATAR

Customise your character down to the smallest detail, with a huge array of clothing, accessories, hairstyles, jewels, face items and even tattoos!
Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style, and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colours.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy, and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items are released every week!

CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM

Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the colour scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D metaverse where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Lounge out and party with your friends at the Love Island Villa, a special public room created in collaboration with the Love Island TV series!

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions! Who knows, maybe your favourite artist will make an appearance! Keep an eye on our Socials to stay up-to-date on the schedule.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/HotelHideawayTheGame
twitter.com/HotelHideaway
instagram.com/hideaway_official
youtube.com/c/HotelHideaway/
tiktok.com/@hideaway.official

Reflect your own personal style in your avatar, or go overboard with outrageous costumes. The outfit combinations are endless!
Express yourself, your style, and your mood by creating your own outfits from hundreds of different clothing items and colours.
From formal to casual, streetwear to fantasy, and everything in between, there’s something for everyone.
New exciting items are released every week!

CUSTOMISE AND DECORATE YOUR ROOM

Design and customise your own hotel room with a wide selection of furniture items and decorations!
Turn your room into an epic house party haven for you and your friends, or a private place for rest and relaxation far away from the bustling hallways and public rooms of the Hotel.
Place every item and choose the colour scheme to best fit your own dream room design.
New furniture items are released regularly!

SOCIALISE AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS

Chat with other guests and form tribes. Making new friends and influencing others is the only way to become the most popular guest!
Gather your friends and form your own Group. Complete objectives and daily tasks, and compete with other Groups to earn exclusive rewards.
Explore the Hotel with other guests and discover hidden secrets.
Hangout with your friends!
Show off your sense of style and become an icon among your companions!

3D LIVE SOCIAL ROLE PLAYING GAME

Hotel Hideaway is a 3D metaverse where you can become who you’ve always wanted to be.
Chat live and meet with other people from around the world.
Visit unique locations and explore what the Hotel has to offer. Relax in the spa, party at the beach or hang out in the many other public rooms with your friends!
Be the center of attention with stylish clothing items and outrageous outfits.
Take part in themed seasonal events; there's new things to see and do in the Hotel every month.

REGULAR LIVE EVENTS

Lounge out and party with your friends at the Love Island Villa, a special public room created in collaboration with the Love Island TV series!

Attend regularly held concerts and performances by real world artists and performers in the Hotel’s unique Concert Venue – a special public room open only during these special occasions! Who knows, maybe your favourite artist will make an appearance! Keep an eye on our Socials to stay up-to-date on the schedule.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the unique world of Hotel Hideaway NOW and leave your mark!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for ages 17+.
